content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (position x=-4.5, y=3.0)
- Steam engine (position x=1.5, y=7.5)
- Connected water and steam pipes
- Small electric pole for power distribution

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=15.5, y=70.5)
- Electric mining drill (position x=18.5, y=70.5)
- Electric mining drill (position x=21.5, y=70.5)
- Stone furnace (position x=16.0, y=73.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=19.0, y=73.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=22.0, y=73.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=16.5, y=74.5) connecting iron ore furnace to steel furnace
- Burner inserter (position x=19.5, y=74.5) connecting iron ore furnace to steel furnace
- Burner inserter (position x=22.5, y=74.5) connecting iron ore furnace to steel furnace

### Steel Production Line at position(16.0, 76.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position x=16.0, y=76.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=19.0, y=76.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=22.0, y=76.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=25.0, y=76.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=28.0, y=76.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=16.5, y=77.5) with wooden chest (position x=16.5, y=78.5) for steel plate output
- Burner inserter (position x=19.5, y=77.5) with wooden chest (position x=19.5, y=78.5) for steel plate output
- Burner inserter (position x=22.5, y=77.5) with wooden chest (position x=22.5, y=78.5) for steel plate output
- Burner inserter (position x=25.5, y=77.5) for steel plate output to transport belt
- Burner inserter (position x=28.5, y=77.5) for steel plate output to transport belt
- Transport belts (position x=25.5, y=78.5 and x=28.5, y=78.5) for steel plate collection

### Additional Iron Mining and Smelting at position(33.5, 74.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=33.5, y=74.5)
- Stone furnace (position x=34.0, y=77.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=34.5, y=78.5)
- Wooden chest (position x=34.5, y=79.5) for iron plate storage
- Transport belt (position x=33.5, y=79.5) for potential iron plate transport

### Additional Iron Mining and Smelting at position(29.5, 81.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=29.5, y=81.5)
- Stone furnace (position x=30.0, y=84.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=30.5, y=85.5)
- Wooden chest (position x=30.5, y=86.5) for iron plate storage
- Transport belt (position x=29.5, y=86.5) for potential iron plate transport

### Transport Belt Systems
Consists of:
- Main belt (from x=14.5, y=79.5 to x=27.5, y=79.5)
- Collection belt (from x=30.5, y=88.5 to x=11.5, y=88.5)
- Vertical belts (position x=25.5, y=78.
